slide_1.header_tagline: Leading Indian Electronics Company for High-Technology Solutions

business_overview_card.main_narrative: Centum Electronics is an Indian diversified electronics company specializing in high-technology solutions for defense, aerospace, and space sectors. It offers customized product design, manufacturing services, and turnkey solutions globally.
bullets: Proven track record in mission-critical electronics and passenger information systems.
Global operations across North America, Europe, and Asia with a diverse customer base.

thesis_points.title: Robust Order Book & Revenue Visibility
thesis_points.detail: Centum Electronics maintains a substantial order book of ₹1,303 crore as of September 30, 2024, ensuring strong revenue visibility for the medium term, particularly in high-margin segments.

thesis_points.title: Capitalizing on High-Growth Sectors
thesis_points.detail: The company is well-positioned to leverage increasing demand for high-end electronic systems across defense, aerospace, and industrial applications, diversifying its product offerings.

thesis_points.title: Strategic Expansion & R&D Focus
thesis_points.detail: Centum is actively pursuing M&A opportunities and expanding its engineering R&D capabilities, targeting significant growth in India's ER&D export market by 2030.
